statements: SELECT * FROM sas_analytics_data;
SELECT member_name, data_type, data_value FROM sas_analytics_data WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, data_type FROM sas_analytics_data WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT member_name, data_value FROM sas_analytics_data WHERE team_id = 2 AND project_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT team_id, project_id FROM sas_analytics_data ORDER BY team_id DESC, project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sas_analytics_data WHERE team_id = 10 ORDER BY project_id DESC, data_value ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT project_id, member_name FROM sas_analytics_data WHERE data_type = 'visualization' ORDER BY member_name, data_value DESC
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_value, team_id FROM sas_analytics_data GROUP BY team_id HAVING avg_value > 50 ORDER BY team_id
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_value FROM sas_analytics_data WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM sas_analytics_data WHERE data_value >= 100 GROUP BY team_id ORDER BY num_records DESC
SELECT * FROM sas_analytics;
SELECT name, age FROM sas_analytics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM sas_analytics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, age FROM sas_analytics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM sas_analytics WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sas_analytics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM sas_analytics WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM sas_analytics;
SELECT * FROM data_warehousing WHERE data_type LIKE 'SQL_%' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM data_warehousing;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM sas_analytics_customers;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM sas_analytics_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM sas_analytics_products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM sas_analytics_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sas_analytics_sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM sas_analytics_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM sas_analytics_customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM sas_analytics_products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, total_amount FROM sas_analytics_customers JOIN sas_analytics_sales ON sas_analytics_customers.customer_id = sas_analytics_sales.customer_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM sas_analytics_customers JOIN sas_analytics_sales ON sas_analytics_customers.customer_id = sas_analytics_sales.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sas_employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM sas_employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM sas_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, email FROM sas_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_name, quantity FROM sas_sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sas_employees
SELECT employee_name, department FROM sas_employees ORDER BY department ASC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM sas_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT client_name, contact_person, email FROM sas_clients WHERE client_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_name, quantity FROM sas_sales WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT e.name, t.task_name, a.hours_worked FROM employees e, tasks t, assignments a WHERE e.employee_id = a.employee_id AND t.task_id = a.task_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) FROM departments GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT e.name, t.task_name, a.hours_worked FROM employees e INNER JOIN tasks t ON e.employee_id = t.project_id INNER JOIN assignments a ON t.task_id = a.task_id;
